      • getPendingNews

        public PrintableNews[] getPendingNews(java.lang.Integer numReviewers)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ValidationGateway
        Lists all the printable news in the system which have been reviewed by, at most, maxReviewers.
        Specified by:
        getPendingNews in interface ValidationGateway
        Parameters:
        numReviewers - Maximum number of reviewers in the system.
        Returns:
        The list of PrintableNews, in no specific order.

      • correctNews

        public boolean correctNews(PrintableNews pn)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ValidationGateway
        Uploads a revised version of the news, which replaces the old one. The list of reviewers is then cleared (set to empty).
        Specified by:
        correctNews in interface ValidationGateway
        Parameters:
        pn - The new version of the news
        Returns:
        True if and only if the operation could be completed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.

      • validateNews

        public boolean validateNews(PrintableNews pn,
                            Journalist jn)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ValidationGateway
        Adds the Journalist jn as reviewer in the PrintableNews pn
        Specified by:
        validateNews in interface ValidationGateway
        Parameters:
        pn - The PrintableNews that has been reviewed by the journalist
        jn - The journalist him/herself
        Returns:
        True if and only if the operation could be completed, the PrintableNews exists, it has not been modified and the journalist was not listed as reviewer already.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.
